def_cn: (尤指在战争中)俘虏，擒获，占领，夺取
def_en: If you capture someone or something, you catch them, especially in a war.

def_cn: 代表（特点);表现,体现(感情、气氛)
def_en: If something or someone captures a particular quality, feeling, or atmosphere, they represent or express it successfully.

def_cn: 吸引(注意力);激发(想象);赢得(喜爱)
def_en: If something captures your attention or imagination, you begin to be interested or excited by it. If someone or something captures your heart, you begin to love them or like them very much.
If an event is captured in a photograph or on film, it is photographed or filmed.
If you capture something that you are trying to obtain in competition with other people, you succeed in obtaining it.
